Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

resource.description: Scheduled audits can be used to specify the checks you want to perform during an audit and how often the audit should be run.

properties.name: DayOfMonth
properties.description: The day of the month on which the scheduled audit takes place. Can be 1 through 31 or LAST. This field is required if the frequency parameter is set to MONTHLY.

type.description: The day of the month on which the scheduled audit takes place. Can be 1 through 31 or LAST. This field is required if the frequency parameter is set to MONTHLY.

properties.name: DayOfWeek
properties.description: The day of the week on which the scheduled audit takes place. Can be one of SUN, MON, TUE,WED, THU, FRI, or SAT. This field is required if the frequency parameter is set to WEEKLY or BIWEEKLY.

type.description: The day of the week on which the scheduled audit takes place. Can be one of SUN, MON, TUE,WED, THU, FRI, or SAT. This field is required if the frequency parameter is set to WEEKLY or BIWEEKLY.

properties.name: Frequency
properties.description: How often the scheduled audit takes place. Can be one of DAILY, WEEKLY, BIWEEKLY, or MONTHLY.

type.description: How often the scheduled audit takes place. Can be one of DAILY, WEEKLY, BIWEEKLY, or MONTHLY.

properties.name: ScheduledAuditName
properties.description: The name you want to give to the scheduled audit.

type.description: The name you want to give to the scheduled audit.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

type.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

properties.name: TargetCheckNames
properties.description: Which checks are performed during the scheduled audit. Checks must be enabled for your account.

type.description: Which checks are performed during the scheduled audit. Checks must be enabled for your account.

attributes.description: Scheduled audits can be used to specify the checks you want to perform during an audit and how often the audit should be run.

properties.name: ScheduledAuditArn
properties.description: The ARN (Amazon resource name) of the scheduled audit.

type.description: The ARN (Amazon resource name) of the scheduled audit.
